TITLE: Create Digital Pass
APPLE_INTRODUCTION: Scan your membership card to create an Apple Wallet Pass. Your name and your gym are optional, without the gym the pass will not be geotagged.
ANDROID_INTRODUCTION: Scan your membership card to create a digital pass for compatible Android Apps. Your name and your gym are optional, without the gym the pass will not be geotagged.
APPLE_DOWNLOAD: Create and download your Apple Wallet Pass, this will take a couple of seconds.
ANDROID_DOWNLOAD: Create and download your digital pass. Either select Android App Pass or download the PKPASS-File and use another App of your choosing.
